Package org.fcrepo.server.journal

    AbstractJournalTester
    Title: AbstractJournalTester.java
    AllIntegrationTests  
    AllUnitTests  
    MockJournalReader
    Read Journal XML from a String buffer.
    MockJournalRecoveryLog
    Write recovery log messages to a List for examination in unit tests.
    MockJournalWriter
    A JournalWriter that writes to a String buffer.
    MockServerForJournalTesting  
    TestJournalRoundTrip
    Check every management method to be sure: that we know whether it is journaled or not that we know what items are stored in the context for recovery that a journaled method is played back the same as it was recorded that a journaled method WILL NOT be accepted from an outside source by a JournalConsumer that a non-journaled method WILL be accepted from an outside source by a JournalConsumer
